::DrillBit::

"No official report on the base yet, but I believe it to be tottaly
atomized. Probably nothing left but a few sheets of scrap metal."

::Dollen::

He walked up to DrillBit and Darkfate.
"I was there when it went up in smoke. Nothing but shrapnel left."
